channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A crackdown on immigration is leading to a sharp drop in U.S. population growth
item.description: A sharp drop in net immigration has led to a slowdown in U.S. population growth. The Census Bureau says the population grew only about half as fast in...

item.title: How did Tucker Carlson become one of the far right's most influential voices?
item.description: Writer Jason Zengerle says Carlson had the foresight to see Trump's potential in 2015. Now he's someone the president "definitely listens to." Zengerl...

item.title: Scientists shed new light on the brain's role in heart attack
item.description: Researchers discovered a feedback loop between nerve cells, the immune system and the heart. They think it shows promise as a target for future therap...

item.title: 'Fireworks' wins Caldecott, Newbery is awarded to 'All the Blues in the Sky'
item.description: The best books for children and young adults were awarded the country's top honors by the American Library Association on Monday.

item.title: Ex-FIFA president Sepp Blatter joins those calling for boycott of World Cup in U.S.
item.description: Former FIFA president Sepp Blatter is backing a proposed fan boycott of World Cup matches in the United States because of the conduct of President Tru...

item.title: What's a good short-term CD account interest rate in 2026?
item.description: Even in today's economy, short-term CD accounts remain competitive. Here's what can be considered a good one now.

item.title: Man hospitalized after exchanging gunfire with Border Patrol agents in Arizona
item.description: A man suspected of smuggling immigrants in the country illegally has allegedly opened fire on Border Patrol agents, who returned fire, according to a ...

item.title: Judge blocks ICE from deporting or transferring 5-year-old and his father
item.description: A federal judge on Tuesday temporarily barred federal immigration officials from deporting 5-year-old Liam Conejo Ramos and his father.

item.title: Trump visiting Iowa to kick off midterm election campaigning
item.description: Sources say Iowa is seen as a key part of the Trump team's strategy to keep the House in GOP hands.

item.title: Judge orders ICE chief to appear in court or risk contempt over denial of due process
'We all know someone who was killed' - Iran protesters tell BBC of brutal crackdown
item.description: Young Iranians able tell the BBC how they saw friends and other people die as security forces crushed protests earlier this month.

item.title: Families sue US over deadly boat strike off Venezuela coast
item.description: Relatives of Chad Joseph and Rishi Samaroo - among six killed on 14 October - say the Trinidadian men were returning home when their vessel was hit.

item.title: US to send ICE agents to Winter Olympics, prompting Italian anger
item.description: The US federal agency says it will not play an immigration role at February's event in Milan-Cortina.

item.title: TikTok settles just before social media addiction trial to begin
item.description: Defendants include Meta, which owns Instagram and Facebook, and YouTube parent Google.

item.title: Judge finds Virginia Democratsâ€™ redistricting resolution illegal
item.description: A Virginia judge has ruled that a proposed constitutional amendment allowing Democrats to redraw their Congressional maps is illegal.

item.title: TikTok US pushes back on claims it is censoring content
item.description: Thousands of people claim political content is being suppressed after the US operation was spun off.

item.title: Detective says cruelty of woman's murder will "stay with me forever"
item.description: Lt. Dakota Black of the Pottawatomie County Sheriff's Office in Shawnee, Oklahoma, says the case of Makayla Meave, a missing teacher's aide, was one o...

item.title: Minneapolis shooting scrambles Second Amendment politics for Trump
